qa.name: Dreamer
qa.clothing: Shimmering robes that change color with the light

hf.name: Cloudweaver
hf.appearance: Stocky, with a beard made of mist

tr.name: Zephyr
tr.essence: Wind spirit and guardian of the sky

json_to_edit.voice_over: In the realm where dreams touch the sky, a city takes flight.
json_to_edit.description: Dreamer constructs a magnificent floating city in the clouds.
json_to_edit.location: Amidst the clouds in the open sky
json_to_edit.name: Skyborn Metropolis
json_to_edit.scene_summary: Dreamer, aided by Cloudweaver and watched over by Zephyr, builds a breathtaking city that floats among the clouds.

qa.action: A vast expanse of sky with Dreamer standing on a small cloud platform, surveying the area.

hf.action: Dreamer waves her hands, and glowing blueprints of the city appear in the air around her.

tr.action: Cloudweaver molds a mass of clouds into the foundation of a building, his hands moving with practiced precision.

xc.action: Zephyr's eyes, swirling with air currents, watch the construction with keen interest.

ka.action: Multiple cloud platforms rise from below, each carrying a different part of the city's infrastructure.

fn.action: Dreamer channels energy from the sky, weaving it into the cloud structures to solidify them.

af.action: The camera moves through the partially built city, revealing intricate cloud architecture and floating gardens.

qo.action: Cloudweaver's hands shape a delicate cloud spire, adding fine details with his misty fingers.

fp.action: The completed floating city is revealed in all its glory, a shimmering metropolis suspended in the sky.

edit_command: Remove every third shot from the scene, but don't change anything else.

updated_json.voice_over: In the realm where dreams touch the sky, a city takes flight.
updated_json.description: Dreamer constructs a magnificent floating city in the clouds.
updated_json.location: Amidst the clouds in the open sky
updated_json.name: Skyborn Metropolis
updated_json.scene_summary: Dreamer, aided by Cloudweaver and watched over by Zephyr, builds a breathtaking city that floats among the clouds.

qa.action: A vast expanse of sky with Dreamer standing on a small cloud platform, surveying the area.

hf.action: Dreamer waves her hands, and glowing blueprints of the city appear in the air around her.

xc.action: Zephyr's eyes, swirling with air currents, watch the construction with keen interest.

fn.action: Dreamer channels energy from the sky, weaving it into the cloud structures to solidify them.

af.action: The camera moves through the partially built city, revealing intricate cloud architecture and floating gardens.

fp.action: The completed floating city is revealed in all its glory, a shimmering metropolis suspended in the sky.

label.rationale: we will remove every third shot from the scene as requested, while keeping all other elements unchanged. this means we'll remove shots with keys "tr", "ka", and "qo" from the "shots" dictionary. we'll also update the "list_display_order" to reflect these removals. the "number_of_shots" will be updated from "9" to "6" to reflect the new total. all other elements in the json will remain the same.
